message: This is a fair deal. Take it or leave it!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a sizable portion to avoid further devaluation. This is a generous offer considering the circumstances.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 55/45 this time. We both get a decent chunk, and we avoid further losses.
Alice, time is literally money at this point!  I'm proposing a 52.5/47.5 split. It's better than what we'll both get if we drag this out further.
